name: MOVE!
description:
Your name is LEEROY MCHOSTER.

Your game is the product of 24 hours of work, and is the sole completed game of North Bay's 1st ever Game Jam.  Originally started by Neojock almost 8 years ago, this game has been completely rebuilt from the ground up by me- G0ATFAC3. So sit back, but don't relax! It's not an easy game!
